name: Easy E-mail Customizer for WooCommerce
author: WPOxium

sections.description:
Easy E-mail Customizer for WooCommerce is the ultimate plugin for customizing your WooCommerce email content for your WooCommerce shop. You can edit all the default WooCommerce e-mails and any third-party WooCommerce e-mails to your likings. Staying connected with your customers in a personalized and meaningful way is crucial. With our powerful plugin, you can take full control of your email content and create and personalize the default WooCommerce e-mails for your customers.

Use our powerful template tags to fully customize your texts with dynamic content. You want to add the billing name or address to your e-mails? Or even add a complete order table to it? We have 35+ template tags which you can add to your personalized WooCommerce e-mails.

Premium features

With the premium version of our plugin you can take editing your transactional e-mails to another level. Some of our premium features:

  • Use our powerful real-time e-mail previewer to see a preview of your WooCommerce e-mail directly in your browser.
  • Use any of your orders to use in the previewer
  • An extensive library of template tags that inject dynamic content into your emails. Address your customers by name, display their billing address, or present the order table, each email will carry a personalized touch that captivates recipients.
  • Use conditionals: Tailor your email content with precision using conditionals. You can create custom texts that appear only under specific conditions. Imagine showing a special message for orders containing specific products, products from a particular category, or orders eligible for free shipping.
  • Developer friendly: Add your own, custom template tags for custom, non-default, WooCommerce e-mails easily with our ready-to-use filters or modify existing template tags.

Get our premium plugin
sections.faq:
Can I add and change texts for any WooCommerce e-mail?

Yes, you modify the contents of any possible WooCommerce e-mail to your likings.

Can I add dynamic content to my WooCommerce e-mails?

Yes, you can add any of our template tags to add dynamic content to your e-mails.

Can I change the colors or the logo of my e-mails?

No, but you can change the colors or add a logo through the WooCommerce e-mail settings. The logo and colors are e-mail wide and therefore itâ€™s not possible to change it with our plugin, but only through the default WooCommerce settings.

Use template tags to use in your e-mails
Use template tags to add default WooCommerce blocks to your e-mail, like the order table
